I have read somewhere - I cannot remember where - that Goto menuki 
have so=
metimes been mounted as the decoration on kodzuka or kogai.  Is 
the kodzuk=
a illustrated in my photo album JPL one such?

It is of good quality shakud=
o, with a worn, horizontal nanako surface 
within a raised rim.  The decora=
tion is a raised shakudo boss with a 
circumferential nanako decoration.  T=
his rests upon a gold base, and 
depicts six pawlonia mon of the 3-5-3 vari=
ety, with a seventh set deep 
at the centre.  This one is less worn than th=
e other six, and is very 
detailed in its execution.  The whole sits upon a=
 silver ?shuttle.  
The reverse is of polished shakudo, and the kodzuka is =
unsigned.

See http://tinyurl.com/77rxt

Regards and thanks, John L.
